sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"相同的"之意。
means: same ： 可指相同的人或物，也可指在质量、外表或意义等方面相同，但实际上有差别的事物。
identical ： 着重指人或物等在每细节上都完全相同。
very ： 侧重指完全同一，没有区别。
equal ： 多指在价值等方面相当而不相同的事物。
equivalent ： 主要指有同样价值、效力或意义的两种不同的事物。

sentence.Network_en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentence.Network_cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentence.Network_en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentence.Network_en: They found their computers producing different results from exactly the same calculation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现他们的计算机进行完全相同的计算会得出不同的结果。

lj.lj_ly: she knew they had meant it kindly, but it had hurt all the same.
lj.lj_ls: 她知道他们是出于好意，但还是伤害了她。

jx.jx_en_mean: on the other hand; nevertheless, yet
jx.jx_cn_mean: 另一方面；然而，不过，可是

lj.lj_ly: it's a very creative place, but at the same time it's very relaxing.
lj.lj_ls: 这是个非常有创造性的地方，然而又是个能使人松弛的地方。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 对…不重要，对…来说无所谓

lj.lj_ly: it was all the same to me where it was being sold.
lj.lj_ls: 它在哪里销售对我来说无所谓。

lj.lj_ly: it was all the same to me where it was being sold.
lj.lj_ls: 它在哪里销售对我来说无所谓。

jx.jx_en_mean: the same person or thing (used for emphasis)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 同一个人（或物)，完全一样的人（或物）（用作强调）

jx.jx_en_mean: another drink of the same kind as the last (said as a request or offer)
jx.jx_cn_mean: （同样的酒）再来一杯（用作要求或提议）

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express the speaker's belief that two or more things are essentially the same, in spite of apparent differences
used to convey that something is drearily predictable or familiar
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用以表示某事可想而知令人生厌或熟悉］一模一样；老一套

lj.lj_ly: the game's fantasy setting is the same old, same old.
lj.lj_ls: 这款游戏的奇幻背景还是老样子。

jx.jx_en_mean: may you do or have the same thing (a response to a greeting or insult)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 你也是（用于回答对方的问候或辱骂）

jx.jx_en_mean: the same (used for emphasis, often to express surprise)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 正是这个的，完全相同的（用于强调，常表示惊讶）

lj.lj_ly: the very same people who practised all the rules are now the most sceptical.
lj.lj_ls: 正是执行所有这些规则的人现在最怀疑这些规则。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old Norse sami, from an Indo-European root shared by Sanskrit sama, Greek homos

encyclopedia.content: 发音 英音：[seim] 美音：[sem] 解释词性及含义 adj.形容词 1.not changed or different 一样的，同一的，原来的 ⒉alike in every way 同样的 ⒊ this same,that same 前面提到的，上述的 ⒋ the same 无变化的，老一套的 pron.代词 ⒈the same thing 同样的事物 adv.副词 ⒈the same (as) 同样地 ⒉same as 锛埛钦斤級跟…一样 用法 形容词 a. 1.（通常与the连用）同一的[B] 例如：This is the same skirt that she was weari

entry.def: If two or more things, actions, or qualities are the same, or if one is the same as another, they are very like each other in some way.

example.ex: The houses were all the same — square, close to the street, needing paint...
example.tran: 房子都一模一样——方方正正、临近街道、需要粉刷。

example.ex: In essence, all computers are the same...
example.tran: 所有的电脑其实都一样。

entry.def: If something is happening the same as something else, the two things are happening in a way that is similar or exactly the same.

example.ex: I mean, it's a relationship, the same as a marriage is a relationship...
example.tran: 我的意思是它是一种人际关系，就如同婚姻也是一种人际关系一样。

example.ex: I want to go home having won a game of football the same as you leave the ground and you want to go away with your team having won...
example.tran: 你希望离开赛场的时候自己的球队取得了胜利，同样我也想赢了一场球赛再回家。

entry.def: You use same to indicate that you are referring to only one place, time, or thing, and not to different ones.

example.ex: Bernard works at the same institution as Arlette...
example.tran: 伯纳德和阿莱特在同一家机构工作。

example.ex: It's impossible to get everybody together at the same time...
example.tran: 让所有人同时聚在一起是不可能的。

entry.tran: 无变化的;一成不变的;千篇一律的
entry.def: Something that is still the same has not changed in any way.

example.ex: Taking ingredients from the same source means the beers stay the same...
example.tran: 取材自同一原材料意味着啤酒的口味始终如一。

example.ex: Only 17% said the economy would improve, but 25% believed it would stay the same.
example.tran: 仅 17% 的人说经济状况会改善，却有25% 的人认为经济会维持老样子。

entry.def: You use the same to refer to something that has previously been mentioned or suggested.

example.ex: We made the decision which was right for us. Other parents must do the same...
example.tran: 我们作出了对于我们而言正确的决定。其他父母也必须这么做。

example.ex: In the United States small specialised bookshops survive quite well. The same applies to small publishers...
example.tran: 美国的小型专业书店经营状况不错。小型出版社也是如此。

entry.tran: (用于商业信件、法案等文件中)上述事物，上述情况
entry.def: You use same to refer to something that has already been mentioned in a document such as a business letter or bill.

example.ex: Wrist watches: £100. Inscription of same: £15.
example.tran: 腕表: 100英镑。在其上刻字: 15英镑。

entry.def: You say 'same here' in order to suggest that you feel the same way about something as the person who has just spoken to you, or that you have done the same thing.

example.ex: 'Nice to meet you,' said Michael. 'Same here,' said Mary Ann...
example.tran: “很高兴见到你，”迈克尔说。“我也是，”玛丽·安说。

example.ex: 'I hate going into stores.' — 'Same here,' said William.
example.tran: “我讨厌进商店。”——“我也一样，”威廉说。

entry.tran: 你也一样，你也是(用于致以同样的祝愿)
entry.def: You say 'same to you' in response to someone who wishes you well with something.

example.ex: 'Have a nice Easter.' — 'And the same to you Bridie.'
example.tran: “复活节快乐。”——“你也一样，布赖迪。”

example.ex: 'Goodbye, then, and thanks. Good luck.' — 'The same to you.'
example.tran: “那么，再见，谢谢。祝你好运。”——“也祝你好运。”

entry.def: You say 'same again' when you want to order another drink of the same kind as the one you have just had.

example.ex: Give Roger another pint, Imogen, and I'll have the same again.
example.tran: 再给罗杰来一杯，伊莫金，我也再来一份同样的。

entry.def: You can say all the same or just the same to introduce a statement which indicates that a situation or your opinion has not changed, in spite of what has happened or what has just been said.

example.ex: I arranged to pay him the dollars when he got there, a purely private arrangement. All the same, it was illegal...
example.tran: 我准备等他到那儿时付给他美元，纯属私人安排。不过同样也是非法的。

example.ex: He was unable to pay attention to the papers on his desk. Just the same, he pulled over the stack of papers and started to examine them...
example.tran: 他的心不在桌子上的那一摞试卷上，尽管如此，他还是拽过来开始评阅。

entry.tran: 对我完全一样;对我毫无区别;我都无所谓
entry.def: If you say 'It's all the same to me', you mean that you do not care which of several things happens or is chosen.

example.ex: Whether I've got a moustache or not it's all the same to me...
example.tran: 我留不留胡子都无所谓。

example.ex: What's the difference between a white lie and a lie? I mean, it's all the same to me.
example.tran: 善意的谎言和谎言之间有什么不同？我是说，对于我而言二者完全一样。

entry.def: When two or more people or things are thought to be separate and you say that they are one and the same, you mean that they are in fact one single person or thing.

example.ex: Luckily, Nancy's father and her attorney were one and the same person...
example.tran: 幸运的是，南希的父亲就是她的律师。

example.ex: I'm willing to work for the party because its interests and my interests are one and the same.
example.tran: 我愿意为该党效力，因为它的利益和我的利益完全一致。

entry.tran: 正是这个;同一个人(或事物)
entry.def: You say 'the same' or 'the very same' in reply to someone's question when you are saying that they have identified a person or thing correctly.

example.ex: 'This Sawtry guy, he is John Sawtry?' — 'Yes, sir. The very same.'
example.tran: “这个叫索特里的小伙子，他是约翰·索特里吗？”——“是的，先生。正是他。”

sentences.sentence: "this road is the same one we were on yesterday"
"on the same side of the street"

means.word_mean: 2. closely similar or comparable in kind or quality or quantity or degree;

sentences.sentence: "curtains the same color as the walls"
"mother and son have the same blue eyes"
"gave one six blows and the other a like number"
"his attitude is the same as ever"
"you get treated fairly, same as any other student in this course!"

list.explanation: 具有相同观点(的)，有问感(的)，相一致(的)，相互协调(的)，相互理解(的)

example.en: We're not on the same wavelength. Let's try again.
example.zh: 我们相互不协调。让我们再试试。

example.en: We kept talking until we were on the same wavelength.
example.zh: 我们继续交谈，直谈到我们相互理解为止。

example.en: Finding a restaurant on your wavelength is easy.
example.zh: 找一家合你胃口的餐馆并不难。

auth_sentence.res_content: The same with the arts and many other areas.

auth_sentence.res_content: How about looking at salaries at the same time?

stems_affixes.word_buile: sam相类似,一样+e→adj.相同的；上述的 pron. 同样的人，同样事物
sam相类似,一样+e→adj.相同的；上述的 pron. 同样的人，同样事物

sentences.en: I live in the same house as he.

means.word_mean: 相同的; 同样的; （与…）相同的; 一模一样的

sentences.en: Her success encouraged me to try the same thing.
sentences.cn: 她的成功激励我去做同样的尝试。

sentences.en: This book is the same size as that.
sentences.cn: 这本书同那本书一样大小。

means.word_mean: 同一事物; 同样的人; （和…）同样的事物, 相同的事物

sentences.en: The mother scrubbed the floor and her child did the same.
sentences.cn: 母亲擦洗地板, 孩子也跟着干。

sentences.en: We must all say the same.

jushi.english: No two human beings have the same palm prints.
jushi.chinese: 没有两个人的掌纹是一样的。

jushi.english: I live in the same house as he.
You are arguing along the same old lines.
jushi.chinese: 你还是按老一套的思路来争论。
